author: thomas.langlois
title: Cardanobi.io
description: There's a great deal of value locked in the data processed by Cardano and its ecosystem. How to extract it and make it available to all?
solution: Build a Business Intelligence API Layer to provide on-chain analytics and enable new data-driven services on Cardano.
experience: SPO running ADACT (adacapital.io) & ZETIC (zeteticstakepool.com), 20+ years exp full-stack dev/prod  in FS industry, event-driven, API, AI.
